page.title: 16Chinley Brownies
page.content:
I am a Brownie in the 2nd Chinley pack. We play games and have challenge groups to win badges. Our Guides Mrs Hobson and Brown Owl, Mrs Hughes are teaching us to march for the Derby Cavalcade to celebrate seventy five years of Brownies and Guides. I am getting very nervous and my tummy feels as though it is a bag of gob-stoppers rumbling. There are rules. You must sew all your badges on your uniform in the right place and borrow a hat if you haven't got one. There is a man coming in to teach us how to march - left, right, left, right. Then we are to go up Eccles Pike to light seventy five candles on the Birthday cake.
by{Fiona Darby
